alert.note: Alert for South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 01 at 5:18PM MST until March 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...South Central Mountains and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 8 PM MST this evening. For the High Wind Warning, until 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
